Rules.Title: Register New Seller Form
Rules.Introduction: To sign up as a seller in Waffer, please follow the steps below, keeping in mind that y,our request will be verified by the administrator and you will be notified by e-mail if all conditions are met:
Rules.Rule1: Create a seller account and provide the required information (name, e-mail) to move to the next stage.
Rules.Rule2: Set up the seller account, where we must provide the following information:
Rules.Rule2.1: Business name as it is registered on the trade license.
Rules.Rule2.3: Branch or store name: the store name that will appear on the website.
Rules.Rule3: Check your address again, and then add your ways of communicating.
Rules.Rule5: Choose the product you want to sell.
